name: webtools-intake
description: Client intake, research, and project brief creation for the webtools website pipeline. Research clients via web search, website crawling (delegated to webtools-init web-crawler), and business registry lookups (D14). Unified RESEARCH+PREP flow with .raw.md compression. Generate tailored questionnaires (D11) and process client input in real-time across four modes (PREP, MEETING, REVIEW, BRIEF) with progressive questioning, confidence-scored solutions, and structured project brief output (D1).
